original: 潁川潁陰人，歷仕曹魏、西晉。為荀彧庶子，雖自幼即有天才之名，但品德與其父截然不同，劣跡顯著，熱衷於權勢，逢迎當權者。
text: Yingchuan Yingyin people, Li Shi Cao Wei, Western Jin Dynasty. As Xun Yu's concubine, although he has been known as a genius since he was a child, his morality is completely different from his father's. He has significant disadvantages. He is keen on power and welcomes those in power.
